arts.sum: Some Leeds United fans will be pleased with how the season has gone so far. The Whites have expected above what everyone has expected at this point of the season. arts.ttl: Connor Roberts denied reunion with Leeds United after injury blow
arts.sum: Leeds United return from the international break this weekend when they face Burnley at Turf Moor. Daniel Farke and Scott Parker clash once again after a fierce promotion battle to the wire last season. arts.ttl: Two ruled out, with one major doubt – Daniel Farke confirms team news for Burnley game
arts.sum: Leeds United are back in action this weekend as they take on Scott Parker’s Burnley side.
